title: Ground News - Texas man accused of using Snapchat to lure, sexually assault minor
text:
Summary by San Antonio Express-News A man from Magnolia is charged with sexual assault of a child after reportedly engaging in a month of Snapchat sexting with San Antonio girl, 14. Share menu More
